commits.content:
import React from 'react'; import { FaUser, FaEnvelope, FaPhone, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaGraduationCap } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { BsCalendarDate } from 'react-icons/bs'; import { IoMdArrowDropdown } from 'react-icons/io'; const SignUpForm = () => { return (

SIGN UP

{/* Full Name */}
{/* Email */}
{/* Phone Number */}
{/* City */}
{/* Age */}
{/* Qualification */}
{/* Select Gender */}
{/* Programming Background */}
{/* Select Course */}
{/* Submit Button */}
); }; export default SignUpForm;
